title: As Time Goes By
description: For five years handsome Jeff Taylor has wanted to apologize to Bobbie Bradford in person. But she left town the day after the humiliating episode at the picnic and never returned. Older now, Jeff has grown in his faith and as a man. Still, the news that Bobbie is returning to Santa Rosa while considering Cleve Ramsey√¢ s proposal of marriage comes as a shock. Will their friendship be restored after heartbreaking betrayal? Can love grow As Time Goes By?
author: Lori Wick
